GE07bhg4c05u:17: tathā cājñādhikārikaṃ karma na jñānena saha samuccīyate tejas-timirayor iva yugapad asambhavāt karmādhikāra-hetu-bheda-buddhy-apanodakatvena jñānasya tad-virodhitvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:19: jñāna-kāryasyājñāna-nāśasya karmaṇā kartum aśakyatvāt tam eva viditvāpi mṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'nāyanāya iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:20: jñāne jāte tu karma-kāryaṃ nāpekṣyata evety uktaṃ yāvān artha udapāne ity atra /
GE07bhg4c05u:21: tathā ca jñāninaḥ karmānadhikāre niścite prārabdha-karma-vaśād vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpeṇa tad-anuṣṭhānaṃ vā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso veti nirvivādaṃ caturthe nirṇītam /
GE07bhg4c05u:22: ajñena tv antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvārā jñānotpattaye karmāṇy anuṣṭheyāni tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:23: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca /

GE07bhg4c05u:26: śānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet,
GE07bhg4c05u:27: tyajataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ tyuktuḥ pratyak paraṃ padam,
GE07bhg4c05u:29: vedān imaṃ lokam amuṃ ca parityajyātmānam anvicchet ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c05u:30: tatra karma tat-tyāgayor ārād upakāraka-saṃnipatyopakārakayoḥ prayājāvaghātayor iva na samuccayaḥ sambhavati viruddhatvena yaugapadyābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:31: nāpi karma-tat-tyāgayor ātma-jñāna-mātra-phalatvenaikārthatvād atirātrayoḥ ṣoḍaśi-grahaṇāgrahaṇayor iva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:33: karmaṇo hi pāpa-kṣaya-rūpam adṛṣṭam eva dvāraṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:34: saṃnyāsasya tu sarva-vikṣepābhāvena vicārāvasara-dāna-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam eva dvāram /
GE07bhg4c05u:35: niyamāpūrvaṃ tu dṛṣṭa-samavāyitvād avaghātādāv iva na prayojakam /
GE07bhg4c05u:36: tathā cādṛṣṭārtha-dṛṣṭārthayor ārād upakāraka-saṃnipātyopakārakayor eka-pradhānārthatve 'pi vikalpo nāsty eva /

GE07bhg4c05u:43: tathā coktam - na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:45: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:46: yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate // [Gītā 6.3] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:50: brahmāvāptyai tu tat-tyāga īpsantīti śruter balāt // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:52: kaṣāya-paṅktiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ /

GE07bhg4c05u:65: tasyaiva viraktatā-daśāyāṃ saṃnyāsaḥ śravaṇādy-avasara-dānena jñānārthaṃ iti daśā-bhedenājñam adhikṛtyaiva karma-tat-tyāgau vyākhyātuṃ pañcama-ṣaṣṭhāv adhyāyāv ārabhyete /

GE07bhg4c05u:69_1: jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati kathayasi veda-mukhena punas tad-viruddhaṃ yogaṃ ca karmānuṣṭhāna-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi /

GE07bhg4c05u:79: pūrvādhyāyānte śrutena vākya-dvāreṇa virodham āśaṅkamānaḥ pṛcchati sannyāsam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:82: iti vākyena tvaṃ karma-yogenotpanna-jñānasya karma-saṃnyāsaṃ brūṣe /
GE07bhg4c05u:85: ity anena punas tasyaiva karma-yogaṃ ca brūṣe /
GE07bhg4c05u:86: na ca karma-saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ,

GE07bhg4c05u:93: śuddhasya tad-akartṛtvaṃ tvety ādi prāha pañcame //
GE07bhg4c05u:94: dvitīye mumukṣuṃ praty ātma-vijñānaṃ mocakam abhidhāya tad-upāyayā niṣkāmaṃ karma kartavyam abhyadhāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:95: labdha-vijñānasya na kiṃcit karmāstīti yas tv ātma-ratir eva syāt iti tṛtīye,
GE07bhg4c05u:96: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha iti caturthe cāvādīt /
GE07bhg4c05u:97: ante tu tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ [Gītā 4.42] ity ādinā tasyaiva punaḥ karma-yogaṃ prāvocat /
GE07bhg4c05u:100: karmaṇāṃ sannyāsaṃ sarvendriya-vyāpāra-virati-rūpaṃ jñāna-yogam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:101: punar yogaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ ca sarvendriya-vyāpāra-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi /
GE07bhg4c05u:104: tasmāl labdha-jñānaḥ karma sannyased anutiṣṭhed veti bhavad-abhimataṃ vettum aśakto 'haṃ pṛcchāmi /
GE07bhg4c05u:112: śrīdharaḥ : atrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:113: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na hi vedānta-vedyātma-tattvajñaṃ prati karma-yogam ahaṃ bravīmi /
GE07bhg4c05u:115: api tu dehātmābhimāninaṃ tvāṃ bandhu-vadhādi-nimitta-śoka-mohādi-kṛtam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ dehātma-viveka-jñānāsinā chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam ātiṣṭheti bravīmi /
GE07bhg4c05u:116: karma-yogena śuddha-cittasyātma-tattva-jñāne jāte sati tat-paripākārthaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṅgatvena saṃnyāsaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:117: evaṃ saty aṅga-pradhānayor vikalpa-yogāt saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś cety etāv ubhāv api bhūmikā-bhedena samuccitāv eva niḥśreyasaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:118: tathāpi tu tayor madhye tu karma-saṃnyāsāt sakāśāt karma-yogo viśiṣṭo bhavatīti //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:120: evam arjunasya praśne tad-uttaram śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:122: tayos tu karma-saṃnyāsād anadhikāri-kṛtāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate śreyān adhikāra-sampādakatvena //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:124: karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti jñāninaḥ karma-karaṇe na ko 'pi doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:125: pratyuta niṣkāma-karmaṇā citta-śuddhi-dārḍhyāj jñāna-dārḍhyam eva syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:126: saṃnyāsinas tu kadācit citta-vaiguṇye sati tad-upaśamanārthaṃ kiṃ karma niṣiddham ?
GE07bhg4c05u:128: viṣaya-grahaṇe tu vāntāśitvam eva syād iti bhāvaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:129: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:132: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na khalu labdha-jñānasyāpi karma-yogo doṣāvahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:134: jñāna-niṣṭhatayā karma-sannyāsinas tu citta-doṣe sati tad-doṣa-vināśāya karmānuṣṭheyaṃ pratiṣedhaka-śāstrāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:135: karma-tyāga-vākyāni tv ātmani ratau satyāṃ karmāṇi taṃ svayaṃ tjayantīty āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:136: tasmāt sukaratvād apramādatvāj jñāna-garbhatvāc ca karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:139: jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati /
GE07bhg4c05u:140: nirdvandvo hi mahā-bāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:141: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃnyāsitvena karma-yoginaṃ stuvaṃs tasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ darśayati jñeya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:142: rāga-dveṣādi-rāhityena parameśvarārthaṃ karmāṇi yo 'nutiṣṭhati sa nityaṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'pi saṃnyāsīty evaṃ jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:143: tatra hetuḥ nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣādi-dvandva-śūnyo hi śuddha-citto jñāna-dvārā sukham anāyāsenaiva bandhāt saṃsārāt pramucyate //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:145: tam eva karma-yogaṃ stauti jñeya iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:146: sa karmaṇi pravṛtto 'pi nityaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:147: ko 'sau ? yo na dveṣṭi bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇaṃ karma niṣphalatva-śaṅkayā /
GE07bhg4c05u:149_0: nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣa-rahito hi yasmāt sukham anāyāsena he mahābāho bandhād antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-rūpāj
GE07bhg4c05u:151: na ca sannyāsa-prāpyo mokṣo 'kṛta-saṃnyāsenaiva tena na prāpya iti vācyam ity āha jñeya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:152: sa tu śuddha-cittaḥ karmī nitya-saṃnyāsī eva jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:153: he mahābāho iti mukti-nagarīṃ jetuṃ sa eva mahāvīra iti bhāvaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:154: baladevaḥ : kuto viśiṣyate tatrāha jñeya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:157: yaḥ karmāntargatātmānubhavānanda-paritṛptas tato 'nyat kiṃcit na kāṅkṣati na ca dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c05u:158: nirdvandvo dvandva-sahiṣṇuḥ sukham anāyāsena sukara-karma-niṣṭhayety arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:161: sāṃkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:162: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam //4//
GE07bhg4c05u:163: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evam aṅga-pradhānatvenobhayor avasthā-bhedena krama-samuccayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:164: ato vikalpam aṅgīkṛtyobhayoḥ kaḥ śreṣṭha iti praśno 'jñāninām evocitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:165: na vivekinām ity āha sāṅkhya-yogāv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:167: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau eka-phalau santau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālā ajñā eva pravadanti na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:168: tatra hetuḥ - anayor ekam apy samyag āsthita āśritavān ubhayor api phalam āpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:169: tathā hi karma-yogaṃ samyag anutiṣṭhan śuddha-cittaḥ san jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindati /
GE07bhg4c05u:170: saṃnyāsaṃ samyag āsthito 'pi pūrvam anuṣṭhitasya karma-yogasyāpi paramparayā jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindatīti na pṛthak phalatvam anayor ity arthaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c05u:172: nanu yaḥ karmaṇi pravṛttaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñātavyaḥ karma-tat-tyāgayoḥ svarūpa-virodhāt phalaikyāt tatheti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c05u:174: tathā ca niḥśreyasa-karāv ubhāv ity anupapannam ity āśaṅkyāha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:175: saṃkhyā samyag ātma-buddhis tāṃ vahatīti jñānāntaraṅga-sādhanatayā sāṅkhyaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:177: tau pṛthag viruddha-phalau bālāḥ śāstrārtha-viveka-jñāna-śūnyāḥ pravadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:180_0: ucyate - ekam apy saṃnyāsa-karmaṇor madhye samyag āsthitaḥ svādhikārānurūpeṇa samyag
GE07bhg4c05u:180_1: yathā-śāstraṃ kṛtavān sann ubhayor vindate phalam jñānotpatti-dvāreṇa niḥśreyasam ekam eva //4 //
GE07bhg4c05u:182: tasmād yac chreya evaitayor iti tvad-uktam api vastuto na ghaṭate /
GE07bhg4c05u:183: vivekibhir ubhayoḥ pārthakyābhāvasya dṛṣṭatvād ity āha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:185: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālāḥ vadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:186: na tu vijñāḥ jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvokteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:188: baladevaḥ : yaḥ śreya etayor ekam iti tvad-vākyaṃ ca na ghaṭata ity āha sāṃkhyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:189: jñāna-yoga-karma-yogau phala-bhedāt pṛthag-bhūtāv iti bālāḥ pravadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:191: ataeva ekam ity ādi phalam ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇam //4//
GE07bhg4c05u:194: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:195: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:196: śrīdharaḥ : etad eva sphuṭayati yat sāṃkhyair iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:197: sāṃkhyair jñāna-niṣṭhaiḥ saṃnyāsibhir yat sthānaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ prakarṣeṇa sākṣād avāpyate,
GE07bhg4c05u:198: yogair ity ārśa āditvān matv-arthīyo 'c-pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:199: tena karma-yogibhir api tad eva jñāna-dvāreṇa gamyate 'vāpyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:200: ataḥ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca ekaphalatvena ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:202: ekasyānuṣṭhānāt katham ubhayoḥ phalaṃ vindate tathāha yat sāṃkhyair iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:203_1: eva saṃskṛtāntaḥ-karaṇaiḥ śravaṇādi-pūrvikayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā yat prasiddhaṃ sthānaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:203_2: tiṣṭhaty evāsmin na tu kadāpi cyavata iti vyutpattyā mokṣākhyaṃ prāpyata āvaraṇābhāva-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:204: yogair api bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā phalābhisandhi-rāhityena kṛtāni karmāṇi śāstrīyāṇi yogās te yeṣāṃ santi te 'pi yogāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:206: tair yogibhir api sattva-śuddhyā saṃhyāsa-pūrvaka-śravaṇādi-puraḥ-sarayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā vartamāne bhaviṣyati vā janmani sampatsyamānayā tat sthānaṃ gamyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:208: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati nānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:209: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yeṣāṃ saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena prāg-janmasu bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhānumīyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:211: yāny ato 'nyāni janmāni teṣu nūnaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GE07bhg4c05u:212: yat kṛtyaṃ puruṣeṇeha nānyathā brahmaṇi sthitiḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:213: evaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena bhāvinī saṃnyāsa-pūrvajñāna-niṣṭhānumīyate sāmagryāḥ kāryāvyabhicāritvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:214: tasmād ajñena mumukṣuṇāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye prathamaṃ karma-yogo 'nuṣṭheyo na tu saṃnyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:215: sa tu vairāgya-tīvratāyāṃ svayam eva bhaviṣyatīti //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:220: ataeva tad dvayaṃ pṛthag-bhūtam api yo vivekenaikam eva paśyati sa paśyati,
GE07bhg4c05u:226: ataeva tad dvayaṃ nivṛtti-pravṛtti-rūpatayā bhinna-rūpam api phalaikyād ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati vetti,
GE07bhg4c05u:227: sa paśyati sa cakṣuṣmān paṇḍita ity arthaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:230: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:232: śrīdharaḥ : yadi karma-yogino 'py antataḥ saṃnyāsenaiva jñāna-nisṭhā tarhy ādita eva saṃnyāsaḥ kartuṃ yukta iti manvānaṃ praty āha saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:233: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā saṃnyāso duḥkham āptum duḥkha-hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:236: yoga-yuktas tu śuddha-cittatayā muniḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvācireṇaiva brahmādhigacchati /
GE07bhg4c05u:238: ataś citta-śuddheḥ prāk karma-yoga eva saṃnyāsād viśiṣyata iti pūrvoktaṃ siddham /
GE07bhg4c05u:243: aśuddhāntaḥkaraṇenāpi saṃnyāsa eva prathamaṃ kuto na kriyate jñāna-niṣṭhā-hetutvena tasyāvaśakatvād iti cet tatrāha saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:244: ayogato yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śodhakaṃ śāstrīyaṃ karmāntareṇa haṭhād eva yaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ sa tu duḥkham āptum eva bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:246: śodhake ca karmaṇy anadhikārāt karma-brahmobhaya-bhraṣṭatvena parama-saṅkaṭāpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:247_0: karma-yoga-yuktas tu śuddhāntaḥkaraṇatvān munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvā brahma
GE07bhg4c05u:247_1: satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ na cireṇa śīghram evādhigacchati sākṣātkaroti pratibandhakābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:250: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati // [Gītā 3.4] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:251: ata eka-phalatve 'pi karma-saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad upapannam //6//
GE07bhg4c05u:253: kintu samyak-citta-śuddhim anirdhārayato jñāninaḥ saṃnyāso duḥkhadaḥ karma-yogas tu sukhada eveti pūrva-vyañjitam arthaṃ spaṣṭam evāha saṃnyāsas tv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:255: ayogataḥ karma-yogābhāvāc citta-vaiguṇya-praśāmaka-karma-yogasya saṃnyāsiny abhāvāt tatra anadhikārād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:260: śrutir api -yadi na samuddharanti yatayo hṛdi kāma-jaṭā iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:261: bhagavatāpi yas tva saṃyata-ṣaḍ-vargaḥ [BhP 11.18.40] ity ādy uktam /
GE07bhg4c05u:262: tasmād yoga-yuktaḥ niṣkāma-karmavān munir jñānī san brahma śīghraṃ prāpnoti //6//
GE07bhg4c05u:263: baladevaḥ : jñāna-yogasya duṣkaratvāt sukara-karma-yogaḥ śreyān ity āha saṃnyāsas tv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:265: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā duḥkhaṃ prāptum bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:266: duṣkaratvāt sapramādatvāc ca duḥkha-hetur eva syād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:267: yoga-yukta-niṣkāma-karmī tu munir ātma-manana-śīlaḥ sann acireṇa śīghram eva brahmādhigacchati //6//
GE07bhg4c05u:272: śrīdharaḥ : karma-yogādi-krameṇa brahmādhigame saty api tad-uparitanena karmaṇā bandhaḥ syād evety āśaṅkyāha yoga-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:274: ataeva viśuddha ātmā cittaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:277: tataś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasya sa loka-saṅgrahārthaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vā karma kurvann api na lipyate //7//
GE07bhg4c05u:279: nanu karmaṇo bandha-hetutvād yoga-yukto munir brahmādhigacchatīty anupapannam ity ata āha yoga-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:281: tena yogena yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ prathamaṃ viśuddhātmā viśuddho rajas-tamo-bhyām akaluṣita ātmāntaḥkaraṇa-rūpaṃ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:286: yasyaite nityatā daṇḍāḥ sa tridaṇḍīti kathyata // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:288: etādṛśasya tattva-jñānam avaśyaṃ bhavatīty āha sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtātmā sarva-bhūta ātma-bhūtaś cātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:289: jaḍājaḍātmakaṃ sarva ātma-mātraṃ paśyann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:290: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasyeti vyākhyāne tu sarva-bhūtātmety etāvataivārtah-lābhād ātma-bhūtety adhikaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:292: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī kurvann api karmāṇi para-dṛṣṭyā na lipyate taiḥ karmabhiḥ sva-dṛṣṭyā tad-abhāvād ity arthaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c05u:294: kṛtenāpi karmaṇā jñāninas tasya na lepa ity āha yogeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:295: yoga-yukto jñānī trividhaḥ - viśuddhātmā vijita-buddhir ekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:299: etādṛśe gṛhasthe tu sarve 'pi jīvā anurajyantīty āha sarveṣām api bhūtānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadībhūta ātmā deho yasya saḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c05u:300: baladevaḥ : īdṛśī mumukṣuḥ sarveṣāṃ preyān ity āha yogeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:305: ataeva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ jīvānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadatām gata ātmā deho yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:306: na cātra pārtha-sārathinā sarvātmaikyam abhimatam - na tv evāham ity ādinā sarvātmanāṃ mitho bhedasya tenābhidhānāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:308: evambhūtaḥ kurvann api viviktātmānusandhānād anātmany ātmābhimānena na lipyate acireṇātmānam adhigacchati /
GE07bhg4c05u:312: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattva-vit /
GE07bhg4c05u:313: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan //8//
GE07bhg4c05u:314: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api /
GE07bhg4c05u:316: śrīdharaḥ : karma kurvann api na lipyata ity etad viruddham ity āśaṅkya kartṛtvābhimānābhāvān na viruddham ity āha naiveti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c05u:317_0: karma-yogena yuktaḥ krameṇa tattvavid bhūtvā darśana-śravaṇādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:317_1: vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan kiṃcid apy ahaṃ na karomīti manyeta manyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:326: etāni karmāṇi kurvann api abhimānābhāvād brahma-vin na lipyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:327: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtram - tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvāghayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśād iti //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:330_1: ca tat-tac-ceṣṭāsu kriyamāṇāsu indriyāṇīndriyādīny evendriyārtheṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:330_2: vartante pravartante na tv aham iti dhārayann avadhārayann naiva kiṃcit karomīti
GE07bhg4c05u:330_3: manyeta manyate tattvavit paramārtha-darśī yuktaḥ samāhita-cittaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:331: athavādau yuktaḥ karma-yogena paścād antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tattvavid bhūtvā naiva kiṃcit karomīti manyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:332: tatra darśana-śravaṇa-sparśana-ghrāṇāśanāni cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ pañca-jñānendriyāṇāṃ vyāpārāḥ paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann ity uktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:336: grahaṇaṃ hastayor iti pañca karmendriya-vyāpārā gacchan pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann ity uktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:340: artha-krama-vaśāt pāṭha-kramaṃ bhaṅktvā vyākhyātāv imau ślokau /
GE07bhg4c05u:341: yasmāt sarva-vyāpāreṣv apy ātmano 'kartṛtvam eva paśyati /
GE07bhg4c05u:342: ataḥ kurvann api na lipyata iti yuktam evoktam iti bhāvaḥ //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:344: yena karmaṇālepas taṃ prakāraṃ śikṣayati naiveti /
GE07bhg4c05u:345: yuktaḥ karma-yogī darśanādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan nirabhimānaḥ kiṃcid apy ahaṃ naiva karomīti manyate //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:347_0: yukto niṣkāma-karmī prādhānika-dehendriyādi-saṃsargād darśanādīni karmāṇi kurvann
GE07bhg4c05u:347_1: api tattva-vit viviktam ātma-tattvam anubhavan indriyārtheṣu rūpādiṣu indriyāṇi cakṣur-ādīni
GE07bhg4c05u:347_2: mad-vāsanānuguṇa-paramātma-preritāni vartanta iti dhārayan niścinvann ahaṃ kiṃcid
GE07bhg4c05u:348: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann iti cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ jñānendriyāṇāṃ darśana-śravaṇa-sparśanāghrānāśanāni vyāpārāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:353: śvasann iti prāṇādīnām unmiṣan nimiṣann iti nāgādīnāṃ prāṇa-bhedānām /
GE07bhg4c05u:357: na tu svarūpaika-nimittam iti manyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:358: na svarūpa-prayuktam ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti śakyam abhidhātuṃ nirdhāraṇe manane ca tasyābhidhānāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:359: tat tac ca jñānam eva tac cātmano nityam /
GE07bhg4c05u:360: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilāpo vidyate iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:361: tat-siddhiś ca hariṇā dharma-bhūtena jñānena ca ity āhuḥ //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:364: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:365: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā //10//
GE07bhg4c05u:366: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yasya karomīti abhimāno 'sti tasya karma-lepo durvāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:367: tathāviśuddha-cittatvāt saṃnyāso 'pi nāsti iti mahat saṅkaṭam āpannam ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:370: yaḥ karmāṇi karoti asau pāpena bandhu-hetutayā pāpiṣṭhena puṇya-pāpātmakena karmaṇā na lipyate yathā padma-patram ambhasi sthitam api tenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat //10//
GE07bhg4c05u:372: tarhy avidvān kartṛtvābhimānāl lipyetaiva tathā ca karthaṃ tasya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā syād iti tatrāha brahmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:373_0: brahmaṇi parameśvara ādhāya samarpya saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ tyaktveśvarārthaṃ bhṛtya
GE07bhg4c05u:373_1: iva svāmy-arthaṃ sva-phala-nirapekṣatayā karomīty abhiprāyeṇa karmāṇi laukikāni vaidikāni
GE07bhg4c05u:373_2: ca karoti yo lipyate na sa pāpena pāpa-puṇyātmakena karmaṇeti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:374: yathā padma-patram upari prakṣiptenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:377: kiṃ ca brahmaṇi parameśvare mayi samarpya saṅgaṃ tyaktvā sābhimāno 'pi karmāsaktiṃ vihāya yaḥ karmāṇi karoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:382: tasmād etad brahma-nāma-rūpam annaṃ ca jñāyata iti śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:383: mama yonir mahad brahma iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:384: dehendriyādīni pradhāna-pariṇāma-viśeṣāṇi bhavanti tad-rūpatayā pariṇate pradhāne darśanādīni karmāṇy ādhāya tasyaivaitāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:385: na tu tad-viviktasya śuddhasya mameti nirdhāryety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:387: yas tāni karoti sa tādṛg dehādimattayā sann api dehādy-ātmābhimānena pāpena na lipyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:389: na ca mayi saṃnyasya karmāṇi iti pūrva-svārasyād brahmaṇi paramātmanīti vyākhyeyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:394: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GE07bhg4c05u:396: śrīdharaḥ : kevalaṃ sattva-śuddhi-mātra-phalam eva tasya karmaṇaḥ syāt yasmāt kāyeneti /
GE07bhg4c05u:398: yoginaḥ saṅgaṃ tyaktvā kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GE07bhg4c05u:400: sarva-vyāpāreṣu mamatā-varjanāya yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ karma kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:406: kāyena manasā buddhyendriyair api yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ phala-saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karma kurvanti kāyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kevalair iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:407: īśvarāyaiva karomi na mama phalāyeti mamatā-śūnyair ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:411: indrāya svāhā ity ādinā havir-ādy-arpaṇa-kāle yadyapi manaḥ kvāpy anyatra tad apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:413: baladevaḥ : sad-ācāraṃ pramāṇayann etad vivṛṇoti kāyeneti /
GE07bhg4c05u:414: kāyādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ karma kāyādy-ahaṃbhāva-śūnyā yoginaḥ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:419: yuktaḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07bhg4c05u:421: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kathaṃ tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścid badhyate iti vyavasthā ?
GE07bhg4c05u:423: yuktaḥ parameśvaraika-niṣṭhaḥ san karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmaṇi kurvann ātyantikīṃ śāntiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:424: ayuktas tu bahirmukhaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā phala āsakto nitarāṃ bandhaṃ prāpnoti //12//
GE07bhg4c05u:426: kartṛtvābhimāna-sāmye 'pi tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścit tu badhyata iti vaiṣamye ko hetur iti tatrāha yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:427_0: yukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety evam abhiprāyavān karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā
GE07bhg4c05u:427_1: karmāṇi kurvan śāntim mokṣākhyām āpnoti naiṣṭhikīṃ sattva-śuddhi-nitya-vastu-viveka-saṃnyāsa-jñāna-niṣṭhā-krameṇa jātām iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:428_0: yas tu punar ayukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety abhiprāya-śūnyaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c05u:428_1: kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā mama phalāyaivedaṃ karma karomīti phale sakto nibadhyate
GE07bhg4c05u:429: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api yuktaḥ san karmāṇi kurv iti vākya-śeṣaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c05u:431: karma-karaṇe anāsakty-āsaktī eva mokṣa-bandha-hetū ity āha yukto yogī niṣkāma-karmītity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:432: naiṣṭhikīm niṣṭhā-prāptāṃ śāntiṃ mokṣam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:435: baladevaḥ : yukta ātmārpita-manāḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā kurvann naiṣṭhikīm sthirāṃ śāntim ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇām āpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:436: ayukta ātmānarpita-manāḥ karma-phale saktaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ karmaṇi pravṛttyā nibadhyate saṃsarati //12//
GE07bhg4c05u:440: nava-dvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan //13//
GE07bhg4c05u:441: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ tāvac citta-śuddhi-śūnyasya saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate ity etat prapañcitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:442: idānīṃ śuddha-cittasya saṃnyāsaḥ śreṣṭha ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:444: sarvāṇi karmāṇi vikṣepakāni manasā viveka-yuktena saṃnyasya sukhaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ sann āste /
GE07bhg4c05u:445: kvāsta iti ? ata āha nava-dvāra iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:446: netre nāsike karṇau mukhaṃ ceti sapta śiro-gatāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:448: evaṃ nava-dvārāṇi yasmiṃs tasmin pure puravad ahaṅkāra-śūnye dehe dehy avatiṣṭhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:449: ahaṅkārābhāvād eva svyaṃ tena dehena naiva kurvan mama-kārābhāvāc ca na kārayan ity aviśuddha-cittād vyavṛttir uktā /
GE07bhg4c05u:450: aśuddha-citto hi saṃnyasya punaḥ karoti kārayati ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:454: aśuddha-cittasya kevalāt saṃnyāsāt karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti pūrvoktaṃ prapañcyādhunā śuddha-cittasya sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva śreyān ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:455_0: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ceti sarvāṇi karmāṇi manasā karmaṇy akarma
GE07bhg4c05u:455_1: yaḥ paśyed ity atroktenākartrātma-svarūpa-samyag-darśanena saṃnyasya parityajya prārabdha-karma-vaśād āste tiṣṭhaty eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:456: kiṃ duḥkhena nety āha sukham anāyāsena /
GE07bhg4c05u:458: kāya-vāṅ-manāṃsi svacchandāni kuto na vyāpriyante tatrāha vaśī sva-vaśīkṛta-kārya-karaṇa-saṅghātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:459: kvāste ? nava-dvāre pure dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike vāg eketi śirasi sapta /
GE07bhg4c05u:460: dve pāyūpasthākhye adha iti nava-dvāra-viśiṣṭe dehe /
GE07bhg4c05u:463: ajño hi dehatādātmyābhimānād deha eva na tu dehī /
GE07bhg4c05u:464: sa ca dehādhikaraṇam evātmano 'dhikaraṇaṃ manyamāno gṛhe bhūmāvasāne vāham āsa ity abhimanyate na tu dehe 'ham āsa iti bheda-darśanābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:465: saṃghāta-vyatiriktātma-darśī tu sarva-karma-saṃnyāsī bheda-darśanād dehe 'ham āsa iti pratipadyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:466: ataeva dehādi-vyāpārāṇām avidyayātmany akriye samāropitānāṃ vidyayā bādha eva sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:467: etasmād evājña-vailakṣaṇyādy-uktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nava-dvāre pure āsta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:468_0: nanu dehādi-vyāpārāṇām ātmany āropitānāṃ nau-vyāpārāṇāṃ tīrastha-vṛkṣa iva vidyayā
GE07bhg4c05u:468_1: bādhe 'pi sva-vyāpāreṇātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ dehādi-vyāpāreṣu kārayitṛtvaṃ ca syād iti
GE07bhg4c05u:468_2: nety āha naiva kurvan na kārayan /
GE07bhg4c05u:471_0: ato 'nāsaktaḥ karmāṇi kurvann api jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvoktavad vastutaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:471_1: saṃnyāsī evocyate tatrāha sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya kāyādi-vyāpāreṇa bahiḥ kurvann
GE07bhg4c05u:472: kutra ? nava-dvāre pure ahaṃ-bhāva-śūnye dehe dehy utpanna-jñāno jīvo naiva kurvann iti karma-sukhasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvaṃ naivāstīti jānan,
GE07bhg4c05u:473: na kārayann iti nāpi teṣu prayojana-kartṛtvam ity api jānann ity arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c05u:475: vivekatā manasā tādṛśi pradhāne sarva-karmāṇi saṃnyasyārpayitvā dehādinā bahis tāni kurvann api vaśī jitendriyaḥ sukhaṃ āste /
GE07bhg4c05u:476_0: nava-dvāre pure puravad ahaṃ-bhāva-varjite dehe dve netre dve nāsike dve śrotre mukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:476_1: ceti śirasi sapta dvārāṇi adhastāt tu pāyūpasthākhye dve iti nava-dvārāṇi dehī labdha-jñānojīvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:477: naiveti dehādi-viviktasyātmanaḥ karmasu kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca nāstīti vijānann ity arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c05u:480: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:482: śrīdharaḥ : nanu eṣa hy evainaṃ sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GE07bhg4c05u:483: eṣa asādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity-ādi-śruteḥ parameśvareṇaiva śubhāśubha-phaleṣu karmasu kartṛtvena prayujyamāno 'svatantraḥ puruṣaḥ kathaṃ tāni karmāṇi tyajet ?
GE07bhg4c05u:484: īśvareṇaiva jñāna-mārge prayujyamāṇaḥ śubhāśubhani ca tyakṣyatīti cet ?
GE07bhg4c05u:485: evaṃ sati vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇyābhyām īśvarasyāpi prayojaka-kartṛtvāt puṇya-pāpa-sambandhaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha na kartṛtvam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c05u:486: prabhur īśvaro jīva-lokasya kartṛtvādikaṃ na sṛjati,
GE07bhg4c05u:488: anādy-avidyā-kāma-vaśāt pravṛtti-svabhāvaṃ jīva-lokam īśvaraḥ karmasu niyuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c05u:489: na tu svayam eva kartṛtvādikam utpādayatīty arthaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c05u:491: devadattasya svagataiva gatir yathā sthitau satyāṃ na bhavati evam ātmano 'pi kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvam na svagatam eva sat-saṃnyāse sati na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:492: athavā nabhasi tala-malinatādivad vastu-vṛttyā tatra nāsty eveti sandehāpohāyāha na kartṛtvam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:493: lokasya dehādeḥ kartṛtvaṃ prabhur ātmā svāmī na sṛjati tvaṃ kurv iti niyogena tasya kārayitā na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:494: nāpi lokasya karmāṇīpsitatamāni ghaṭādīni svayaṃ sṛjati kartāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:495: nāpi lokasya karma kṛtavatas tat-phala-sambandhaṃ sṛjati bhojayitāpi bhoktāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:496: na samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva sadhīḥ ity ādi śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:497: atrāpi śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate [Gītā 13.31] ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:498: yadi kiṃcid api svato na kārayati na karoti cātmā kas tarhi kārayan kurvaṃś ca pravartata iti tatrāha svabhāvas tv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:501: nanu ca yadi jīvasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvādikaṃ naivāsti,
GE07bhg4c05u:502: tarhi parameśvara-sṛṣṭe jagati sarvatra jīvasya kartṛtva-bhokṛtvādi-darśanān manye parameśareṇaiva balāt tasya kartṛtvādikaṃ sṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c05u:504: tatra na hi nahīty āha na kartṛtvam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:506: na ca karma-phalair bhogaiḥ saṃyogam api,
GE07bhg4c05u:508: taṃ jīvaṃ kartṛtvādy-abhimānam ārohayitum iti bhāvaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c05u:509: baladevaḥ : etad dvayaṃ śuddhasya nāstīti viśadayati neti /
GE07bhg4c05u:510: prabhur dehendriyādīnāṃ svāmī jīvo lokasya janasya kartṛtvaṃ na sṛjatīti tvaṃ kurv iti kārayitā na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:511: nāpi tasyepsitatamāni karmāṇi mālyāmbarādīni sṛjatīti svayaṃ kartāpi na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:512: na ca karma-phalena sukhena duḥkhena ca saṃyogaṃ sambandhaṃ sṛjatīti bhojayitā bhoktā ca na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:513: yady evaṃ, tarhi kaḥ kārayan kurvaṃś ca pratīyate ?
GE07bhg4c05u:515: anādi-pravṛttā pradhāna-vāsanātra svabhāva-śabdenokta-prādhānika-dehādimān jīvaḥ kārayitā kartā ceti na viviktasya tattvam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:516: śuddhe 'pi kiṃcit kartṛtvam asty eva pūrvatra sukhāsane tattvasyokteḥ bhānādāv ivaitad bodhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:521: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:523: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt nādatta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:524: prayojako 'pi san prabhuḥ kasyacit pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte na bhajate /
GE07bhg4c05u:527: yadi hi svārtha-kāmanayā kārayet tarhi tathā syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:530: nanu bhaktān anugṛhṇato 'bhaktān nigṛhṇataś ca vaiṣamyopalambhāt katham āpta-kāmatvam iti ?
GE07bhg4c05u:533: evam ajñānena sarvatra samaḥ parameśvara ity evaṃbhūtaṃ jñānam āvṛtam /
GE07bhg4c05u:538: tathā ca śrutiḥ - eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam unninīyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:539: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity ādiḥ / smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c05u:541: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśvabhram eva ca // iti /

GE07bhg4c05u:543: paramārthataḥ vibhuḥ parameśvaraḥ kasyacit jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte paramārthato jīvasya kartṛtvābhāvāt parameśvarasya ca kārayitṛtvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:544_0: kathaṃ tarhi śrutiḥ smṛtir loka-vyavahāraś ca tatrāha ajñānenāvaraṇa-vikṣepā-śaktimatā

GE07bhg4c05u:548: tasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ mūḍha-pratyayānuvādinyāv ete śruti-smṛtī vāstavādvaita-bodhi-vākya-śeṣa-bhūte iti na doṣaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c05u:551: tasmād eva na tasya pāpa-puṇya-bhāgitvam ity āha nādatta iti /

GE07bhg4c05u:559: anyathā eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /

GE07bhg4c05u:565: prayojake tasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ pāpādi-bhāgitvaṃ ca syād iti cet tatrāha nādatta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:566_2: jīvaṃ tad-vāsanānusāreṇa karmāṇi kārayan kasyacij jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca nādatte na gṛhṇāti /
GE07bhg4c05u:572: audāsīnya-mātre 'yaṃ gandhādi-dṛṣṭānto na tv icchāyā abhāve tasyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:574: tarhi jīvās taṃ viṣamaṃ kuto vadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:576: anādi-tad-vaimukhyenājñānena jīvānāṃ nityam api jñānam āvṛtaṃ tirohitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:578: samam api taṃ vimūḍhā viṣamaṃ vadanti na vijñā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:579: āha caivaṃ sūtrakāraḥ - vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati [Vs 2.1.35],

GE07bhg4c05u:583: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ /

GE07bhg4c05u:591_6: bhagavad-anugṛhītānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ teṣāṃ taj jñānaṃ kartṛ / ādityavad
GE07bhg4c05u:592_0: yathādityaḥ svodaya-mātreṇaiva tamo niravaśeṣaṃ nivartayati na tu kaṃcit sahāyam
GE07bhg4c05u:592_1: apekṣate tathā brahma-jñānam api śuddha-sattva-pariṇāmatvād vyāpaka-prakāśa-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:592_2: svotpatti-mātreṇaiva sahakāryantara-nirapekṣatayā sa-kāryam ajñānaṃ nivartayat param
GE07bhg4c05u:592_3: satya-jñānaānantānanda-rūpam ekam evādvitīyaṃ paramātma-tattvaṃ prakāśayati praticchāyā-grahaṇa-mātreṇaiva
GE07bhg4c05u:593: atrājñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānena nāśitam ity ajñānansyāvaraṇatva-jñāna-nāśyatvābhyāṃ jñānābhāva-rūpatvaṃ vyāvartitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:594: nahy abhāvaḥ kiṃcid āvṛṇoti na vā jñānābhāvo jñānena nāśyate svabhāvato nāśa-rūpatvāt tasya /
GE07bhg4c05u:595: tasmād aham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīty ādi-sākṣi-pratyakṣa-siddhaṃ bhāva-rūpam evājñānam iti bhagavato matam /
GE07bhg4c05u:598_0: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat tatha rṣīṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:598_1: tathā manuṣyāṇāṃ tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati
GE07bhg4c05u:598_2: ity ādir yad viṣayaṃ yad-āśrayam ajñānaṃ tad-viṣaya-tad-āśraya-pramāṇa-jñānāt tan-nivṛttir
GE07bhg4c05u:599: tatrājñāna-gatam āvaraṇaṃ dvividham - ekaṃ sato 'py asattvāpādakam anyat tu bhāto 'py abhānāpādakam /
GE07bhg4c05u:601: anumite 'pi vahny-ādau parvate vahnir nāstīty ādi-bhramādarśanāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:602: tathā satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmāsti iti vākyāt parokṣa-niścaye 'pi brahma nāstīti bhramo nivartata eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:603: asty eva brahma kintu mama na bhātīty ekaṃ bhrama-janakaṃ dvitīyam abhānāvaraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:605: sa ca sākṣātkāro vedānta-vākyenaiva janyate nirvikalpaka ity ādy advaita-siddhāv anusandheyam //16//
GE07bhg4c05u:608: tathaivāparā tasya vidyā-śaktir avidyāṃ vināśya jñānaṃ prakāśayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:611: teṣāṃ jīvānāṃ jñānam eva kartṛ ādityavad ity-āditya-prabhā yathāndhakāraṃ vināśya ghaṭa-paṭādikaṃ prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:612: tathaiva vidyayaivāvidyāṃ vināśya taj-jīva-niṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ param aprākṛtaṃ prakāśayati /
GE07bhg4c05u:613: tena parameśvaro na kam api badhnāti,
GE07bhg4c05u:615: kintv ajñāna-jñāne prakṛter eva dharmaḥ krameṇa badhnāti mocayati ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:617: anāsakti-śāntyādayo mocakāś ca prakṛter eva dharmāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:618: kintu parameśvarasyāntaryāmitva eva prakṛtes te te dharmā udbudhyanta ity etad-aṃśenaiva tasya prayojakatvam iti na tasya vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye //16//
GE07bhg4c05u:620: baladevaḥ : vijñā na muhyantīty etad āha jñāneneti /

GE07bhg4c05u:627_1: aupādhikatvaṃ tasya praty uktaṃ neme janādhipāḥ ity upakramoktaṃ ca tat sopapattikam abhūt //16 //
GE07bhg4c05u:632: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃbhūteśvaropāsakānāṃ phalam āha tad-buddhaya iti /

GE07bhg4c05u:641_0: tasmin jñāna-prakāśite paramātma-tattve sac-cid-ānanda-ghana eva bāhya-sarva-viṣaya-parityāgena
GE07bhg4c05u:641_1: sādhana-paripākāt paryavasitā buddhir antaḥkaraṇa-vṛttiḥ sākṣātkāra-lakṣaṇā yeṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:641_2: te tad-buddhayaḥ sarvadā nirbīja-samādhi-bhāja ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:642: tat kiṃ boddhāro jīvā boddhavyaṃ brahma-tattvam iti boddhṛ-boddhavya-bhāvo hi māyā-vijṛmbhito na vāstavābheda-virodhīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:645: ajñā api hi vastu-gatyā tad-ātmāna iti kathaṃ tad-vyāvṛttir iti cet, na /

GE07bhg4c05u:648: vijñās tu nivṛtta-dehādy-abhimānā iti virodhi-nivṛttyā tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyanta iti yuktaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c05u:649: nanu karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepe sati kathaṃ dehādy-abhimāna-nivṛttir iti tatrāha tan-niṣṭhā iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:650: tasminn eva brahmaṇi sarva-karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepa-nivṛttyā niṣṭhā sthitir yeṣāṃ te tan-niṣṭhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:652: phala-rāge sati kathaṃ tat-sādhana-bhūta-karma-tyāga iti tatrāha tat-parāyaṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:653: tad eva param ayanaṃ prāptavyaṃ yeṣāṃ te tat-parāyaṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:655: atra tad-buddhaya ity anena sākṣātkāra uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:657: tat-parāyaṇā ity anena vairāgya-prakarṣaṃ ity uttarottarasya pūrva-pūrva-hetutvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:658: ukta-viśeṣaṇā yatayo gacchanty apunar-āvṛttiṃ punar-deha-sambandhābhāva-rūpāṃ muktiṃ prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:659_0: sakṛn muktānām api punar deha-sambandhaḥ kuto na syād iti tatrāha jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:659_1: jñānena nirdhūtaṃ samūlam unmūlitaṃ punar-deha-sambandha-kāraṇaṃ kalmaṣaṃ puṇya-pāpātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:660: jñānenānādy-ajñāna-nivṛttyā tat-kārya-karma-kṣaye tan-mūlakaṃ punar deha-grahaṇaṃ kathaṃ bhaved iti bhāvaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c05u:663: na tu paramātma-jñānaṃ bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti bhagavad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:664: tasmāt paramātma-jñānārthaṃ jñānibhir api punar viśeṣato bhaktiḥ kāryā ity ata āha tad-buddhaya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:666: tasmin parameśvara eva buddhir yeṣām te tam-manana-parā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:667: tad-ātmānas tan-manaskās tam eva dhyāyanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:668: tan-niṣṭhāḥ jñānaṃ mayi saṃnyaset iti bhagavad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:672: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:673: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram // [Gītā 18.55] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:674: jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣā jñānena vidyāyaiva pūrvam eva dhvasta-samastāvidyāḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c05u:675: baladevaḥ : paramātmany avaiṣamyādi-dhyāyatāṃ phalam āha tad iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:676: tasmiṃs tad-avaiṣamyādike guṇa-gaṇe buddhir niścayātmikā yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c05u:677: tad-ātmānas tasmin niviṣṭa-manasaḥ tan-niṣṭhās tat-tātparyavantas tat-parāyaṇās tat-samāśrayāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:678: evam abhyastena tad-vaiṣamyādi-guṇa-jñānena nirdhūta-kalmaṣā vinaṣṭa-tad-vaimukhyāḥ santa apunar-āvṛttiṃ muktiṃ gacchantīti //17//
GE07bhg4c05u:682: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:683: śrīdharaḥ : kīdṛśās te jñānino ye 'punar-āvṛttiṃ gacchantīty apekṣāyām āha vidyā-vinaya-saṃpanna iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:684: viṣameṣv api samaṃ brahmaiva draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:687: śuno yaḥ pacati tasmin śvapāke ca iti karmaṇā vaiṣamyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:688: gavi hastini śuni ceti jātito vaiṣamyaṃ darśitam //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:690: deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ videha-kaivalya-rūpaṃ jñāna-phalam uktvā prārabdha-karma-vaśāt saty api dehe jīvan-mukti-rūpaṃ tat-phalam āha vidyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:693: tābhyāṃ saṃpanne brahma-vidi vinīte ca brāhmaṇe sāttvike sarvottame /
GE07bhg4c05u:695: tathā hastini śuni śvapāke cātyanta tāmase sarvādhame 'pi /
GE07bhg4c05u:696: sattvādi-guṇais taj-jaiś ca saṃskārair aspṛṣṭam eva samaṃ brahma draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te sama-darśinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:698_0: yathā gaṅgā-toye taḍāge surāyāṃ mūtre vā pratibimbitasyādityasya na tad-guṇa-doṣa-sambandhas
GE07bhg4c05u:699: sarvatra sama-dṛṣṭyaiva rāga-dveṣa-rāhityena paramānanda-sphūrtyā jīvan-muktim anubhavantīty arthaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:701: tataś ca guṇātītānāṃ teṣāṃ guṇa-maye vastu-mātra eva tāratamya-mayaṃ viśeṣam ajighṛkṣūṇāṃ sama-buddhir eva syād ity āha vidyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:704: śuni ca śvapāke ceti tāmas-jātitvād adhame 'pi tat-tad-viśeṣāgrahaṇāt sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā guṇātītāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:708: tādṛśe brāhmaṇe śvapāke ceti karmaṇaitau viṣamau gavi hastini śuni ceti jātyaite viṣamāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:709: evaṃ viṣamatayā sṛṣṭeṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu ye paramātmānaṃ samaṃ paśyanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:711: tat-karmānusāriṇī tena teṣāṃ tathā tathā sṛṣṭiḥ,
GE07bhg4c05u:712: na tu rāga-dveṣānusāriṇīti parjanyavat sarvatra samaḥ paramātmeti //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:715: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:716: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:717: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣamesu sama-darśanaṃ niṣiddhaṃ kurvanto 'pi kathaṃ te paṇḍitāḥ ?
GE07bhg4c05u:718: yathāha gautamaḥ samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjātaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:719: asyārthaḥ samāya pūjayā viṣame prakāre kṛte sati viṣamāya ca same prakāre kṛte sati sa pūjaka iha lokāt para-lokāc ca hīyata iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:724: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye samatve sthitaṃ /
GE07bhg4c05u:725: tatra hetuḥ -- hi yasmād brahma samaṃ nirdoṣaṃ ca tasmāt te sama-darśino brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:727: gautamoktas tu doṣo brahma-bhāva-prāpteḥ pūrvam eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:730: nanu sāttvika-rājasa-tāmaseṣu svabhāva-viṣameṣu prāṇiṣu samatva-darśanaṃ dharma-śāstra-niṣiddham /
GE07bhg4c05u:731: tathā ca tasyānnam abhojyam ity upakramya gautamaḥ smarati samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjāta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:734_1: pūjā-viśesaḥ kriyate tat-samāyaivānyasmai caturveda-pāragāya sad-ācārāya viṣame tad-apekṣayā
GE07bhg4c05u:735_0: tathālpa-vedānāṃ hīnācārāṇāṃ yādṛśo hīna-sādhanaḥ pūjā-prakāraḥ kriyate tādṛśāyaivāsamāya
GE07bhg4c05u:736: kṛte, uttamasya hīnatayā hīnasyottamatayā pūjāto hetos tasya pūjayitur annam abhojyaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:737: pūjayitā pratipatti-viśesam akurvan dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata iti ca doṣāntaram /
GE07bhg4c05u:738: yadyapi yatīnāṃ niṣparigrahāṇāṃ pākābhāvād dhanābhāvāc cābhojyānnatvaṃ dhana-hīnatvaṃ ca svata eva vidyate tathāpi dharma-hānir doso bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:740: tapo-dhanānāṃ ca tapa eva dhanam iti tad-dhānir api dūṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eveti kathaṃ sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā jīvan-muktā iti prāpte pariharati ihaiveti /
GE07bhg4c05u:741: taiḥ sama-darśibhiḥ paṇḍitair ihaiva jīvana-daśāyām eva jito 'tikrāntaḥ sargaḥ sṛjyata iti vyutpattyā dvaita-prapañcaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:742: deha-pātād ūrdhvam atikramitavya iti kim u vaktavyam ?
GE07bhg4c05u:744: yeṣāṃ sāmye sarva-bhūteṣu viṣameṣv api vartamānasya brahmaṇaḥ sama-bhāve sthitaṃ niścalaṃ manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:745: hi yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnyaṃ kūṭastha-nityam ekaṃ ca brahma tasmāt te brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:747: duṣṭatvam hi dvedhā bhavati aduṣṭasyāpi duṣṭa-sambandhāt svato duṣṭatvād vā /
GE07bhg4c05u:750: tatra doṣavatsu śvapākādiṣu sthitaṃ doṣair duṣyati brahmeti mūḍhair vibhāvyamānam api sarva-doṣāsaṃsṛṣṭam eva brahma vyomavad asaṅgatvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:755: na lipyate loka-duḥkhena bāhyaḥ // iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:756: nāpi kāmādi-dharmavattayā svata eva kaluṣitaṃ kāmāder antaḥkaraṇa-dharmatvasya śruti-smṛti-siddhatvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:757: tasmān nirdoṣa-brahma-rūpā yatayo jīvan-muktā abhojyānnādi-doṣa-duṣṭāś ceti vyāhṛtam /
GE07bhg4c05u:761: dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata ity upasaṃhārāc ceti draṣṭavyam //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:764: ihaiva iha loka eva sṛjyata iti sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:766: iha sādhana-daśāyām eva taiḥ sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:767: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye 'vaiṣamyākhye brahma-dharme sthitaṃ niviṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c05u:770: hi yato brahmaṇy avaiṣamyādikaṃ niścikyus tasmāt prapañce tiṣṭhanto 'pi te brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ muktis teṣāṃ sulabhety arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:773: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:775: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-prāptasya lakṣaṇam āha na prahṛṣyed iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:776: brahma-vid bhūtvā brahmaṇy eva yaḥ sthitaḥ sa priyaṃ prāpya na prahṛṣyet prakṛṣṭa-harṣavān syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:777: apriyam prāpya ca nodvijet na viṣīdatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:778: yataḥ sthira-buddhir sthirā niścalā buddhir yasya /
GE07bhg4c05u:781: yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ brahma tasmāt tad-rūpam ātmānaṃ sākṣātkurvann āha na prahṛṣyed iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:782: duḥkheṣv anudvigna-manāḥ sukheṣu vigata-spṛhaḥ ity atra vyākhyātaṃ pūrvārdham /
GE07bhg4c05u:783: jīvan-muktānāṃ svābhāvikaṃ caritam eva mumukṣubhiḥ prayatna-pūrvakam anuṣṭheyam iti vadituṃ liṅga-pratyayau /
GE07bhg4c05u:784: advitīyātma-darśana-śīlasya vyatirikta-priyāpriya-prāpty-ayogyāc ca tan-nimittau harṣa-viṣādāv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:785_0: advitīyātma-darśanam eva vivṛṇoti - sthira-buddhiḥ sthirā niścalā saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-vedānta-vākya-vicāra-paripākeṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:785_1: sarva-saṃśaya-śūnyatvena nirvicikitsā niścitā brahmaṇi buddhir yasya sa tathā labdha-śravaṇa-manana-phala iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:786: etādṛśasya sarvāsaṃbhāvanā-śūnyatve 'pi viparīta-bhāva-pratibandhāt sākṣātkāro nodetīti nididhyāsanam āha - asaṃmūḍhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:789: tataś ca samādhi-paripākeṇa nirdoṣe same brahmaṇy eva sthito nānyatreti brahmaṇi sthito jīvan-muktaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:790: etādṛśasya dvaita-darśanābhāvāt praharṣodvegau na bhavata ity ucitam eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:794: evaṃ laukika-priyāpriyādiṣv api teṣāṃ sāmyam āha na prahṛṣyed iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:797: sādhana-daśāyām evam abhyased iti vivakṣayā vā liṅ /
GE07bhg4c05u:799: baladevaḥ : brahmaṇi sthitasya lakṣaṇam āha neti /
GE07bhg4c05u:800: vartamāne dehe sthitaḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭaṃ priyam apriyaṃ ca prāpya na prahṛṣyen na codvijet /
GE07bhg4c05u:801: kutaḥ ? sthirā svātmani buddhir yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:802: asaṃmūḍho 'nityena dehena nityam ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaṃ na labdhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:807: bāhya-sparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:809: śrīdharaḥ : moha-nivṛttyā buddhi-sthairye hetum āha bāhya-sparśeṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:812: ātmani antaḥ-karaṇe yad upaśamātmakaṃ sāttvikaṃ sukham tad vindati labhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:813: sa copaśamaṃ sukhaṃ labdhvā brahmaṇi yogena samādhinā yuktas tadaikyaṃ prāpta ātmā yasya so 'kṣayaṃ sukham aśnute prāpnoti //21//
GE07bhg4c05u:815: nanu bāhya-viṣaya-prīter aneka-janmānubhūtatvenātipracalatvāt tad-āsakta-cittasya katham alaukike brahmaṇi dṛṣṭa-sarva-sukha-rahite sthitiḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:820: dṛṣṭānandābhilāṣaṃ sa na mandīkartum apy alam // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:824: teṣv asaktātmānāsakta-cittas tṛṣṇā-śūnyatayā viraktaḥ sann ātmani antaḥ-karaṇa eva bāhya-viṣaya-nirapekṣaṃ yad upaśamātmakaṃ sukhaṃ tad vindati labhate nirmala-sattva-vṛttyā /
GE07bhg4c05u:826: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:828: athavā pratyag-ātmani tvaṃ-padārthe yat sukhaṃ svarūpa-bhūtaṃ suṣuptāv anubhūyamānaṃ bāhya-viṣayāsakti-pratibandhād alambhamānaṃ tad eva tad-abhāvāl labhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:829_0: na kevalaṃ tvaṃ-padārtha-sukham eva labhate kintu tat-padārthaikyānubhavena pūrṇa-sukham
GE07bhg4c05u:829_1: apīty āha sa tṛṣṇā-śūnyo brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktas tasmin vyāpṛta
GE07bhg4c05u:830: athavā brahmaṇi tat-padārthe yogena vākyārthānubhava-rūpeṇa samādhinā yukta aikyaṃ prāpta ātmā tvaṃ-padārtha-svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:831: sukham akṣayam anantaṃ sva-svarūpa-bhūtam aśnute vyāpnoti sukhānubhava-rūpa eva sarvadā bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:833_0: tasmād ātmany akṣaya-sukhānubhavārthī san bāhya-viṣaya-prīteḥ kṣaṇikāyā mahā-narakānubandhinyāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:833_1: sakāśād indriyāṇi nivartayet tāvataiva ca brahmaṇi sthitir bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ //21 //
GE07bhg4c05u:835: sa ca bāhya-sparśeṣu viṣaya-sukheṣv asaktātmā anāsakta-manāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:836: tatra hetur ātmani jīvātmani paramātmānaṃ vindati sati prāpte yat sukhaṃ tad akṣayaṃ sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:838: na hi nirantaram amṛtāsvādine mṛttikā rocata iti bhāvaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c05u:839: baladevaḥ : paurvauttaryeṇa sva-parātmānāv anubhavatīty āha bāhyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:840: bāhya-sparśeṣu śabdādi-viṣayānubhaveṣu asaktātmā san yadātmani sva-svarūpe 'nubhūyamāne sukham tadādau vindati,
GE07bhg4c05u:841: tad uttaraṃ brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tad-yuktātmā san yad akṣayaṃ mahad-anubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ sukham tad aśnute labhate //21//
GE07bhg4c05u:844: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te /
GE07bhg4c05u:845: ādy-anta-vantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c05u:846: śrīdharaḥ : nanu priya-viṣaya-bhogānām api nivṛtteḥ kathaṃ mokṣaḥ puruṣārthaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:848: saṃsparśā viṣayās tebhyo jātā ye bhogāḥ sukhāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:849: te hi vartamāna-kāle 'pi spardhāsūyādi-vyāptatvād duḥkhasyaiva yonayaḥ kāraṇa-bhūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:853_0: nanu bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttāv ātmany akṣaya-sukhānubhavas tasmiṃś ca sati tat-prasādād
GE07bhg4c05u:853_1: eva bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttir itītaretarāśraya-vaśān naikam api sidhyed ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c05u:853_2: viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsenaiva tat-prīti-nivṛttir bhavatīti parihāram āha ye hīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:854: hi yasmād ye saṃsparśajā viṣayendriya-sambandha-jā bhogāḥ kṣudra-sukha-lavānubhavā iha vā paratra vā rāga-dveṣādi-vyāptatvena duḥkha-yonaya eva te /
GE07bhg4c05u:857: yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ saṃbandhān manasaḥ priyān /
GE07bhg4c05u:859: etādṛśā aḸ na sthirāḥ kintu ādy-anta-vantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:860: ādir viṣayendriya-saṃyogo 'ntaś ca tad-viyoga evaṃ tau vidyete yeṣāṃ te pūrvāparayor asattvān madhye svapnavad āvirbhūtāḥ kṣaṇikā mithyā-bhūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:861: tad uktaṃ gauḍapādācāryaiḥ - ādāv ante ca yat tv asti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:862: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt teṣu budho vivekī na ramate pratikūla-vedanīyatvāc ca prītim anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:863: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā patañjalinā pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkhair guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ [YogS 2.15] iti /
